thread.title: Progress to Host 2015 Investor and Analyst Day
thread.title_full: Progress to Host 2015 Investor and Analyst Day

author: admin
title: Progress to Host 2015 Investor and Analyst Day
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 2:01 AM   Progress Software 
BEDFORD, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Progress (NASDAQ:PRGS) will host its Investor and Analyst Day on Tuesday, October 20, 2015, beginning at 9:30 a.m. Eastern Daylight Time. During the event, members of Progress senior management will highlight key attributes of the company’s businesses, as well as its overall strategy and financial performance. 
A live audio webcast of the conference including slide presentations will be accessible via the company's website . A replay of the webcast will be accessible on the Progress Investor Relations page for a limited time. 
About Progress 
Progress (NASDAQ:PRGS) is a global software company that simplifies the development, deployment and management of business applications on-premise or in the cloud, on any platform or device, to any data source, with enhanced performance, minimal IT complexity and low total cost of ownership. Progress Software can be reached at www.progress.com or 1-781-280-4000. 
Progress and Progress Software are trademarks or registered trademarks of Progress Software Corporation and/or its subsidiaries or affiliates in the U.S. and other countries. Any other names contained herein may be trademarks of their respective owners.
